description:
Once you make a decision, does the universe conspire to make it happen? Is destiny a matter of chance, a matter of choice or the complex outcome of thousands of warring strands of fate? All twins Kanba and Shoma know is that when their terminally ill sister Himari collapses at the aquarium, her death is somehow temporarily reversed by the penguin hat that she had asked for. It's a provisional resurrection, however, and it comes at a price: to keep Himari alive they need to find the mysterious Penguin Drum. In order to do that, they must first find the links to a complex interlocking chain of riddles that has wrapped around their entire existence, and unravel the knots that tie them to mystifying diary and a baffling string of strangers and semi-acquaintances who all have their own secrets, agendas and "survival strategies." And in order for Himari to live, someone else's chosen destiny will have to change. It's a story of love, fate, life, death... and Penguins!

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)

tags.name: Philosophy
tags.description: Relating or devoted to the study of the fundamental nature of knowledge, reality, and existence.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Family Life
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Terrorism
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a terrorist or terrorist organization.

tags.name: Meta
tags.description: Features fourth wall-breaking references to itself or genre tropes.

tags.name: Denpa
tags.description: Works that feature themes of social dissociation, delusions, and other issues like suicide, bullying, self-isolation, paranoia, and technological necessity in daily lives. Classic iconography: telephone poles, rooftops, and trains.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Trains
tags.description: Prominently features trains.

tags.name: Inseki
tags.description: Features sexual or romantic relations among step, adopted, and other non-blood related family members.

tags.name: Henshin
tags.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

tags.name: Surreal Comedy
tags.description: Prominently features comedic moments that defy casual reasoning, resulting in illogical events.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Crime
tags.description: Centers around unlawful activities punishable by the state or other authority.

tags.name: Memory Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) who has had their memories altered.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Satire
tags.description: Prominently features the use of comedy or ridicule to expose and criticise social phenomena.

tags.name: Cult
tags.description: Features a social group with unorthodox religious, spiritual, or philosophical beliefs and practices.

tags.name: Ghost
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a ghost.

tags.name: Fairy Tale
tags.description: This work tells a fairy tale, centers around fairy tales, or is based on a classic fairy tale.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.name: Achronological Order
tags.description: Chapters or episodes do not occur in chronological order.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Psychosexual
tags.description: Work that involves the psychological aspects of sexual impulses.

tags.name: Incest
tags.description: Features sexual or romantic relations between characters who are related by blood.

tags.name: Rape
tags.description: Features non-consensual sexual penetration.

tags.name: Age Gap
tags.description: Prominently features romantic relations between people with a significant age difference.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

title.native: RE:cycle of the PENGUINDRUM ［前編］ 君の列車は生存戦略
RE:cycle of the PENGUINDRUM ［後編］ 僕は君を愛してる

node.description: Awards: - Most popular voice actor in the Animage Anime Grand Prix (2004) - Best Supporting Actor at the 1st Seiyuu Awards (2007) **Non anime roles:** - Kamisato Ayato - Genshin Impact (Video Game) - Otto Apocalypse - Honkai Impact 3rd (Video Game) - Clotted Cream Cookie - Cookie Run: Kingdom (Video Game) - Phantom - Arknights (Video Game) - Tatsulot - Kamen Rider Kiva (Tokusatsu series) - Luocha - Honkai: Star Rail (Video Game)

__Height:__ 155 cm

[Website](http://king-cr.jp/artist/horie/) | [Profile](https://www.vims.co.jp/talent_profile_detail.php?id=8) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/horieyui-blog/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/horieyui_staff) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yuihorie_official/) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yui_Horie) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%A0%80%E6%B1%9F%E7%94%B1%E8%A1%A3) | [Anison](http://anison.info/data/person/4000.html) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/user/YuiHorieJP)

She is a voice actress and singer currently affiliated with vims. She hosts a radio show called "Horie Yui no Tenshi no Tamago" (堀江由衣の天使のたまご "Yui Horie's Angel Eggs") and is the founding member of the singing group, Aice5. She is also a member of the band Kurobara Hozonkai, with the name YUIEL. Her hobbies include shoulder massaging, reading and eating. She has been affectionately nicknamed "Hocchan" (ほっちゃん) by her Japanese fans.

**Non-anime roles:** 
- Faruzan - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Freesia - Memento Mori (VG)
- Miranda - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Maiden - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Wagon - Ressha Sentai ToQger (Tokusatsu)
- Mine Aomori - Blue Archive (VG)
- Cotton Cookie - Cookie Run: Kingdom (VG)
- Surtr - Arknights (VG)
- Ai-chan - Honkai Impact 3rd (VG)
- Charlotte Corday - Fate/Grand Order (VG)

[Profile](https://osawa-inc.co.jp/women/notomamiko/)

A Japanese actress, voice actress, and singer. She is married and has one kid.

**Non-anime roles:**
- Shinano - Azur Lane (VG)
- Emma - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Skirk - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Durandal - Honkai Impact 3rd (VG)
- Jun Kazama - Tekken series (VG)
- Mother - Avataro Sentai Donbrothers (Super Sentai) 
- Rella Melancoryphus Cygnus - Metaphor: ReFantazio (VG)
- Yi Xuan - Zenless Zone Zero (VG)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hoshino_lily)

Lily Hoshino, alternatively named Ririi Hoshino, is a Japanese mangaka, doujin artist, illustrator and character designer known for her extremely cute art style featured in her many published manga, some of which are shounen-ai. She also does illustrations for yuri magazines.

On January 25, 2016, Lily announced that she had gotten married, while later in March 2019, she gave birth to a baby boy.

__[Website](http://goto.cute.or.jp)__

Gotou began his career as an animator at Atorie. After the closing of Atorie, he worked for other studios such as Project Team Muu and Fenx before going freelancer. He serves as character designer, animation director and animator on countless anime series and contributes to a monthly comic strip to Newtype magazine.

He has been an animator since he graduated from high school at 18. Unlike most other animators Gotou had never gone to an art school. He became interested in animation after seeing an advertisement in an animation magazine saying that animators were needed. Without having any connections within the industry he went on and joined Atelier Giga and studied there for a year under [Akihiko Yamashita](https://anilist.co/staff/103299/) before marking his debut as animator on [Mister Ajikko](https://anilist.co/anime/3437/).

In 1988 Studio Atelier declared bancrupcy and he went to Project Team Muu, which later became Phoenix Entertainment. His first work there was as animator on Anime Sanjushi. When working on the Yuusha Saga, he met Ishida Atsuko on Densetsu no Yuusha Da Garn, who influenced Gotou in his character design, particularly the design of the eyes. Together with the experience from training under Yamashita Akihiko this influence resulted in Gotou's so called "gocky picture" later.

He made his debut as character designer on Choujin Densetsu Urotsukidouji 4 and his debut as series director on Kiddy Grade.

Married to [Megumi Kadonosono](https://anilist.co/staff/100963/).

(Source: Anidb)

__[Website](http://goto.cute.or.jp)__

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ikuni_noise/) | [Website](https://ikuni.net)

**Kunihiko Ikuhara**, nicknamed Ikuni, was born December 21, 1964 in Osaka Prefecture, Japan. Ikuhara is an idiosyncratic, postmodern anime director that had a significant impact on the development of anime styles from the 90s and onward. His surrealist, psychosexual works are why fans often compare him to [David Lynch](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Lynch). Although he is a beloved creative mind, Ikuhara is very hard to deal with and is an overwhelming perfectionist, leading to a small, but important catalog of work. 

**Style**
Ikuhara is an incredibly unique artist, but draws a lot of influence from [Osamu Dezaki](https://anilist.co/staff/100393/Osamu-Dezaki), making interesting anime that focuses on maximal impact on minimal drawings. Key examples would be [*Onii-sama e...*](https://anilist.co/anime/795/Oniisama-e/) and [*Versailles no Bara*](https://anilist.co/anime/338/Versailles-no-Bara/). Their directing also show similarities in how they try to provoke feelings from the viewer. One particular recurring trait would be [their Dutch angles](https://aninomiyako.files.wordpress.com/2011/10/obliqueness.jpg?w=500&h=561), which is used to depict unrest and disorientation. 

Ikuhara's usual stylistic and narrative devices include pretense, deception, metaphors, bluffs, and repetition of gags. His iconography is consistent to the point people made [humorous bingo's](https://i.imgur.com/vlVmMu6.jpg) for his works. His enthusiasm and history with theater led to his most apparent stylistic trait, namely a stage play-like presentation with a mise-en-scène policy of showing only what is necessary, maintaining a tight control of his canvas at all times. Images themselves become a strong narrative tool. The themes of his work often tackle adolescence and LGBTQ-issues and turns them into cartoonish fables that gets to the heart of the issues.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ikuni_noise/) | [Website](https://ikuni.net)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/masuyama56)

Married to [Yuka Shibata](https://anilist.co/staff/124580/).
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/magushigeyasu)

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/大田和寛)

Freelancer with former ties with [Production I.G](https://anilist.co/studio/10/) and [Shaft](https://anilist.co/studio/44/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/sushio_) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/sushiogumicompany/) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%81%99%E3%81%97%E3%81%8A)

Ishizaki Toshio, better known as Sushio, is an animator, illustrator and character designer working for [Trigger](https://anilist.co/studio/803/).

After graduating from Yoyogi Animation Academy, he joined [Gainax](https://anilist.co/studio/6/). He debuted as an in-betweener in [Neon Genesis Evangelion](https://anilist.co/anime/30/), as a key animator on [Berserk](https://anilist.co/anime/33/), and as an animation director on [Mahoromatic](https://anilist.co/anime/276/). In 2007, he served as a character designer for the first time on [Kiss Dum: Engage Planet](https://anilist.co/anime/2106/). He was a key staff member at Gainax for a long time, but left in 2011 when [Hiroyuki Imaishi](https://anilist.co/staff/97349/) and others established the anime production company Trigger. There he was given the job of handling the character designs for [Kill la Kill](https://anilist.co/anime/18679/), the first TV series produced by the newly-found studio.

Specializes in action and effects, and his skills attract a lot of attention in the industry.

Took part as a key animator on Quentin Tarantino's "Kill Bill: Vol. 1" in 2003.

(Source: Wikipedia)

Nishio graduated from Nagoya Designer Academy and started his career at Anime Spot, a subcontracting studio, after being refused in interviews with several animation studios. He debuted as an in-betweener on [Osomatsu-kun](https://anilist.co/anime/9883/) and as a key animator on [Laughing Salesman](https://anilist.co/anime/3077/).

It's on [Yu Yu Hakusho](https://anilist.co/anime/392//) that Nishio came into his own as an animator, developing weighty and realistic movements influenced by [Satoru Utsunomiya](https://anilist.co/staff/101489/). Thanks to the ability demonstrated there, he was chosen to design the characters for [Ninku](https://anilist.co/anime/912/).

After working as character designer and chief animation director on [Jin-Roh](https://anilist.co/anime/570/) he permanently joined Production I.G. where he became known, together with [Hiroyuki Okiura](https://anilist.co/staff/103502/) and [Kazuchika Kise](https://anilist.co/staff/115781/), as "The Three Gods of I.G."

[Masashi Kishimoto](https://anilist.co/staff/96879/) requested for Nishio to be the character designer of the Naruto anime.

In August 2020, he was promoted to company director of Production I.G alongside [Takayuki Gotou](https://anilist.co/staff/103266/Takayuki-Gotou/), a co-founder of the studio.

__[Official Website](http://yakushimaruetsuko.com/)__ | __[Profile](http://yakushimaruetsuko.com/category/profile)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mirairecords)__ | __[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/mirairecords/)__

__Etsuko Yakushimaru__, alternatively known as Tika Alpha when writing lyrics and doing composition, is a Japanese singer, producer, composer, lyricist, arranger, artist, who is also a member and lead vocalist for the band [Soutaisei Riron](https://anilist.co/staff/152353/) (相対性理論).

__[Official Website](http://yakushimaruetsuko.com/)__ | __[Profile](http://yakushimaruetsuko.com/category/profile)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mirairecords)__ | __[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/mirairecords/)__

__Etsuko Yakushimaru__, alternatively known as Tika Alpha when writing lyrics and doing composition, is a Japanese singer, producer, composer, lyricist, arranger, artist, who is also a member and lead vocalist for the band [Soutaisei Riron](https://anilist.co/staff/152353/) (相対性理論).

__[Official Website](http://yakushimaruetsuko.com/)__ | __[Profile](http://yakushimaruetsuko.com/category/profile)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mirairecords)__ | __[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/mirairecords/)__

__Etsuko Yakushimaru__, alternatively known as Tika Alpha when writing lyrics and doing composition, is a Japanese singer, producer, composer, lyricist, arranger, artist, who is also a member and lead vocalist for the band [Soutaisei Riron](https://anilist.co/staff/152353/) (相対性理論).
[Website](http://www.kunion.com) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/92on) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/tsujitakunio)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/135960980) | [Sakugabooru](https://www.sakugabooru.com/post?tags=yoshimichi_kameda)

After graduating from the Department of Fine Arts, Faculty of Art and Design, Onomichi City University he joined studio [AIC](https://anilist.co/studio/48/). 
Currently affiliated with [WIT Studio](https://anilist.co/studio/858).

His animation bears heavy influence from [Yoshinori Kanada](https://anilist.co/staff/106398/) with the added aspect of *Sumi-e* brush painting techniques, resulting in very characteristic lineart. He first attracted attention with his work on [Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood](https://anilist.co/anime/5114/).

Married to [Maiko Okada](https://anilist.co/staff/138501).

STAR DRIVER 輝きのタクト
魔法少女まどか☆マギカ
フリップフラッパーズ

ワンダーエッグ・プライオリティ
